name: RhinoLINUX Lite XFCe Edition
short_description:
RhinoLINUX Lite is the lightweight edition of RhinoLINUX - this edition has a light shell, LXDE, or XFce depending on the release, and a smaller set of applications, which is still complete and able to handle all common document, multimedia and internet filetypes. 

This latest release is compatible with Ubuntu's "saucy" software suite and this project's code name is "Saucy SUZIE".

This edition, called the LITE EDITION as it is intended for lite users (who only need the basics) and for lite PCs (those that are now legacy and perhaps low on resources).  However this edition features a full set of applications and utilities, and can also be happily run on more modern hardware.

In this release:

XFce Desktop Environment 4.10

(XFCE is a low-resource,modern looking desktop GUI with its own Window Manager,xfwin.

UPSTREAM Components:
Ubuntu 13.10 'Saucy Salamander'
Linux Mint 16 'Petra'

FEATURED APPLICATIONS:
LibreOffice,Firefox,VirtualBox,VLC Media Player
summary: RhinoLINUX Lite is a powerful full featured OS that is easy to use
